sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; import "../services/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours.js"; import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating.js"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef = useRef(""); const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null); // this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id); // desctruture properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, address, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); // format date const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} â‚¹ {price}/per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map((review) => (
Harry

{new Date("01-03-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour
))}
john

{new Date("09-06-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour
); }; export default TourDetails;
